user.title: Set up Energy Window Tracker
user.description: Track energy consumed during specific time windows. Each window gets its own sensor showing energy used in that window.

data_description.source_entity: A cumulative kWh sensor that resets daily (e.g. sensor.today_energy_import)

add_window.title: Add window
add_window.description: Define a time window to track. Each window creates a sensor showing energy consumed during that window. Windows may overlap.

data_description.name: Optional label for this window. If left blank, defaults to Window 1, Window 2, etc.

error.window_start_after_end: Window start time must be earlier than window end time.
error.at_least_one_window: At least one window is required.

abort.already_configured: This configuration is already set up.
